# Secret Technique: Insect Sphere

## Quick Facts
- Classification: Hiden~Aburame Clan, Ninjutsu, Chakra Absorption Techniques
- Class: Offensive
- Range: Short, Mid, Long
- Users: Shino Aburame, Shibi Aburame~Anime, Torune Aburame~Game, Tatsuma Aburame~Game
- Media: Anime, Manga, Game, Movie

## Summary
The user sends their kikaichÅ« to spread over a wide range, and the moment they locate the target, the insects gather at once, forming a sphere around the target. They then attach themselves to the target and begin eating away at their chakra.

## Notes
- Even if the target manages to escape, the insects will immediately follow.
